desc: Brown Star Concepts, manufacturer of the RapidTac foregrip, is an innovative company dedicated to providing the finest firearm accessories. Our products are 100% made in the USA!

layout.text: Brown Star Concepts innovative rifle accessories and solutions
Inspired by the need for a more versatile foregrip the RapidTac is ergonomically designed to rotate quickly to any angular position.  Get yours now and become part of the next evolution in foregrips!
